author: Larry K
text:
Staffs are really friendly here and make members feel at home too whenever they see a member walks into the gym they greet them with a smile too, that‚Äôs very nice and rare to see in other AF gyms too!!

Gym lighting looks pretty good now and of course this gotta be one of the cleanest AF in Singapore too! üí™üèº

Machines here are well maintained and staffs are approachable and know their machines well, when a member needs help with certain machines or equipment can ask for help comfortably too :)

10/10!! üíØ

author: Su Lee
text:
This is my ...3rd to 4th time here
Perhaps once in a month or few months here

Still so lovely...I love that there is one toilet and some shower rooms... Clean and in good condition overall.. it's quite spacious and there are alot of equipments. Not convenient to take pics as there are quite a number of members

Excellent gym. Weights, Stations, HIIT, Cardios and Recovery. The full works. Most complete - Even a punching bag and roller foams station with kettlebells. Good gym crowd - All purposeful. Towards students, mature and hardcores. Well laid out - split sections. Cardios facing big wall glass - expansion. 3 cubicles for shower üöø. Always staffed and polite. Probably best AF I have been.

Best hours - 9am to 3pm

text:

Most machines for all muscle groups are actually available at the gym already! üí™üèº ‚Ä¶

author: Chili Red Arowana
text: Big turn off, i cant find the toilet? You walk in you just see the exercise areas.. where is the locker or toilet? 2nd big problem is overcrowded, the weights/mat area is so tiny, one muscle man indian can chope about 30% of the space already? Another 30% a girl put a mat do her stretchingÔºü its a small outlet, and too many ppl come here..

author: AP
text: Great gym but needs to calibrate space management (equipment vs crowd). Staff also seems to have some misunderstanding with member - Approached a member who is on earpiece to lower down volume when no words have been spoken. When asked to clarify, unable to give a satisfactory explanation as to the request.

author: Seng Jie
text: Even though the place is quite packed but their equipments are well maintained and they have machines to train every part of your body.

author: Kenneth Lee
text:
friendly environment, cool and chill gym goers.
solid equipment and machines, especially that v-squat machine.

author: typhoon gt
text: The staff here are very nice and friendly, especially shawn. He goes out of his way to know the regulars :)

author: Soliheen sol
text: Best gym. best staff.hygiene on top form .overall 10/10 gym experience

author: SHLHN
text: Amazing ambience, welcoming/friendly staff & most of the equipment for my workouts

author: Mun Pun
text: W gym, shawn is the best, good equipment and always asking how they can improve

author: Dave Liang
text: New gym, new machines! 1 squat rack, 1 Smith machine and a small area for deadlift with gym mats. Small area for stretching and HIIT. High quality machines.

author: Kenric Neo Kai Yu
text: Cozy and clean environment to work out in, would definitely visit here again!

author: CH
text: Good small clean gym with plenty of equipment but theres only one toilet and its always crowded no matter what time. Members spotted using more than one bar rack despite the peak crowd. I will go there less because of the horrible crowd. 4/5 for the gym, 1/5 for the crowd/members.

author: Jem Jem
text:
Bad experience for a free trial. Went with a friend (who is a member) and got turned away because they apparently need to reply you and confirm that they have slots for you to trial when there are hardly anyone in the gym. And your trial time is the whole day but restricted to 12-4pm only?

Said you should have called us. But there was no contact number to call in the first place and nothing was stated on their website. Profiled you based on where you stay and recommended a day pass of $30 instead of being flexible about it. Heard alot of great comments but am very disappointed of their service. Rather go to other Anytime fitness outlets.

author: Rudy Feroz
text: What's nice is that there are 3 showers, the equipments are brand spanking new (as they should be) and there's tons of cardio machines. For it's size and the fact it's a relatively new gym, there CAN be quite a crowd even during non-peak periods. There is only one toilet which is a minor but possibly inconvenient issue nonetheless depending on the situation. Overall, the toilet and shower area is clean, comes with rain showers, has sizeable mirrors and also comes equipped with hair dryers. For those that regularly check their bodyweight, you'll be happy to know that they do have a weighing scale which provides full body stats, that is unfortunately ONLY accessible during staffed hours and is a paid service. Not so much an issue for anyone with their own weighing scales or those visiting during staffed hours. If your clanging and banging schedule starts at 4am though, you're probably better off visiting another gym to get your weight stats in. The dumbell rack area is definitely a little cramped compared to other AF's of a similar size, so best to avoid peak hours if there's gonna be a few exercises on the list that need you to spend quite abit of time in that section. The rest of the equipments like squat, Smith rack and all the other machines are quite well spaced out. They have a standard line up of equipments that you'd be able to find in most AF's but they definitely stand out with 2 additional equipments which are the seated calf raise and standing leg curls machines, definitely not a common sight in alot of other AF's. The only reason I'm going with 4 stars and not 5 today is cuz I really felt that they could have  designed a little more space to accommodate a slightly larger studio/functional area. A quick chat with any of the staff there and you will probably discover that it's unlikely that there will be a wide range or variety of (if any) classes offered at this AF, not a problem for the weight lifting crowd but definitely a no-go for those who typically visit gyms for classes like HIIT or Yoga etc. Another noteworthy point especially for those that enjoy their ready-made protein drinks or canned pre-workouts from the vending machines that you can usually find across some other AF's, is that you probably might need to bring your own to this outlet as they didn't have a vending machine (at least when I last visited them a couple weeks back that is) throughout my visits.

author: Dane Lee
text: clean & high quality equipment, friendly staff

author: The walking Fridge
text: A lot of different machines and equipments. Fairly big space and everything is well maintained. Hands down one of the best anytime fitness gym

author: In2rovert Life
text:
Newly opened gym (July 2022)

Quite big and has plenty of treadmills/bikes etc

Has everything except seated Bicep/Tricep Machine, Seated Dip Machine, and at the time the set racked barbells went up to only 20kg, believe the heavier ones hadn't arrived yet.

But large multi workout stations and plenty of other machines, inclined Leg Press, squat racks(x2) and a dedicated Deadlift, Crossfit small area make up for it, even has a punching bag/yoga corner.

Quite rare it had a decline chest press machine.

Has 1 toilet, 4 showers with curtains, not glass, the usual lockers(open or close), water cooler, sink, and an area to blow dry your hair.

Staff are friendly.

Nice area as its just a stone's throw from Queenstown MRT, and a short walk to Anchorpoint/Queensway Shopping Centre (the gym is under Alexis condo)

author: mike Ley
text: Nothing beats the Smell of new equipments and helpful staff like Jared Tan showing around the gym.

author: Mig F
text: Worst staff‚Ä¶ very rude, id rather go to queensway or another branch

author: Luisito Maramag
text:
nice new gym, nice new equipments..its just opposite the peugeot service centre...working out while waiting for
my car to be serviced..previously working out at the anytime fitness queensway shopping mall but its closed

author: Aaron Thor
text: Equipments are great! Brand new and well maintained. The gym is very clean and tidy, Staffs are very friendly and welcoming.

author: Dan H (Dazza)
text:
Always a joy to be at the gym at Alexis.

Staffs are friendly and helpful.
Jared did a wonderful job assisting in operations as well as client servicing since its opening.

author: Marley ‚Äú-‚Äù
text: Love this gym. Not so crowded, everything new and clean. Kind staff, good vibes & gainz onlyüí™ ‚Ä¶

author: xiangxuan Bu
text: Tufail goes the extra mile. He interacts with gym goers and spread positive vibes even after working hours. (He stayed back after his shift to help me with my training). Love the guy!

author: Jerome Tong
text:
Saw a lizard watching me lift‚Ä¶ What a *rep*tilean experience

I‚Äôll see myself out

author: Stevie Nicks
text: Nice and new. Friendly gym staff. Nice equipment. No free wifi for members and mobile doesn't get good connection here.

author: Jon
text: Relatively smaller than most AFs. And relatively more crowded as a result. Equipment in new & good condition. Staff is good

author: shahrin Kartoyono
text: Nicely gym they have alot off equipment  and the staff is really friendly thank Jared & max for the kindness I gladly I join AF at Alexis the places is good üëç ‚Ä¶

text: Love it! Staff are happy to help, friendly. Well Equipped

author: glory winowa
text:
Manager
The buff chap has a serious attitude problem
Very high handed and cocky
A turn off for us members
I last visited in march 2023
Never gone back since bec of this bad experience

author: I Homeify
text: I have come to notice that the vending machine in the gym has not been fixed due to issues with the dispenser system as not been working and has been eating people's money.

author: Don V
text: Quite a small gym, but have most of the basic gym equipments.  All equipments are quite new.

author: enkr
text:
